resource.title: The "Bureaucracy Shield" Guest Data Collector
resource.description: Pre-built form template with exact fields required by government portals, passport photo guides, and "soft ask" scripts for collecting guest data.
resource.painPoint: Host fear of imprisonment or fines for missed police reporting. Official portals (FRRO, TM30) are often down or confusing, and gathering data at check-in is chaotic.
keyFeatures: Mirror Fields: Exact fields required by official government portals
Passport Photo Guide: Visual instruction on capturing Bio Page + Visa Page + Arrival Stamp
"Soft Ask" Script: Polite text explaining why data is needed, reassuring guests about privacy

specifics: Form C compliance: Distinguishes "e-Visa" vs "Regular Visa" details
Captures "Given Name" and "Surname" strictly as per passport
india.templateNote: Use this Google Forms template to create your own Form C data collection form. Click 'Use Template' to copy it to your Google account.

specifics: TM30 compliance: Includes "TM.6 Departure Card" field
NA17 compliance: Temporary Residence Declaration fields
